column5: Its been a while since I posted, its been a pretty crazy winter for me. Anyone whose ever had to put their parents in an Old Age home will know what I mean. (Nuf said about that.)  It had been three weeks since there was any snow in Sturgeon so we figured that it would be a safe bet to get into camp. I coudnt believe the snow that was still up there.. a few spots in the road. (Normally I dint even try till May 1st)  Heres some pics from Camp.. I cant wait to get back!  As always Spring Fishing is tough.. we did (WELL I DID) manage tp pull a nice pike off the bottom with a big deep diving crankbait.  Pond behind Camp    Jaden and Jamie   Creek Beside Camp   Very Happy everything was on one piece.. hadnt been back since Nov.   Jaden inAction   Saw our first moose     The boast was nice.    A sight for sore, tired eyes!    Another sight for sore tired eyes.   The trail in.   Fishing in PJ's    TJ 1 - Everyone Else - 0 So far Im in the LEAD!!   Ahh the old snow in the wheelbarrow cooler!!
You need a wheel barrow to get the beer from the house to the dock??? Looks like a great start to the season and you ALL deserve it.   Art
Nice getaway TJ! A real piece of paradise. Thanks for sharing.
awesome TJ !!! place is looking awesome ...feels good to be back doesnt it..
I'm envious.
See ya in July!
Great looking trip! That pike may not be a giant but I'll take it over school any day!
I love the beer cooler!  And the trail in looks like you could walk it in sock feet....oh wait you did that already....  Great little slice of paradise...looking forward to more reports
Always look forward to the jiggy reports TJ !!
Hahahaha, LOL. I remember that post.

Hey.... never let it be said i didnt do anything for Bass Pro. As for the pike, back in the water (as always) she went!!  LOL.. I still have the socks!!  <object width="420" height="315"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=obO9StwVzt0?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=obO9StwVzt0?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=obO9StwVzt0?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420" height="315" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
Tee shirt weather in April that far up....it don't get no better then that....well some tasty walleye help...
Nice TJ... hope to get in to visit this summer. Camp is well stocked with AV Gas and I plan to use it all up!
glad the camp is all in one peice nice pike
Lookin good TJ, and way to go on starting off the fishing season outfishing the wife for a change     A sign of things to come this summer
Watch out everybody...T.J. is out of hibernation    Good to see another Jiggy post T.J.
A much needed R&R for you guys    looks like a peaceful place Thanks for sharing TJunkie
OMG, just watched the video TJ, that's hilarious
nice healthy pike...  and that video is too funny...
Looks like you still got that jacket too!
Thanks for the pictures of Camp TJ. A for the video, I never doubted the socks would hold up...but I did have my fingers crossed for the old fella wearing them! 4 Km is a long haul for that specimen!
Looks awesome, great stuff!!!  Thanks for sharing....
Some great family time and the place looks mint TJ.  You've put alot into it since starting with just the prospector.  Nice to see a report from ya.
Always great to see your posts TJ and I must say I went and bought some of those socks because of your video. There great socks.
